page.title: 19A Day In The Life Of My Dad
page.content:
A Day in the life of my Dad
My Dad sometimes works in the factory or he goes out on a lorry. He works for Pershore Poultry Packers. The ladies who work there pack the dead chickens. He wears two sets of clothes because where he works there are big freezers to keep the dead chickens fresh. His sport is football. He plays for Pershore United. He goes training every Wednesday night. His hobbies are drawing and keeping fit. He keeps fit by running and lifting weights. In the evening he goes to the pub with his friend. He goes to work on his push bike sometimes at one o'clock in the morning. Our family activity is going swimming. I sometimes go with my Dad in the lorry to South Wales.
